title: MLS Creperie
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Bakery, European, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A small restaurant with upstairs and outdoor seating for 30. Serves a wide variety of crepes, salads, breakfasts, coffee and beverages and vegan trdelnik, a Hungarian pastry that is a specialty of Cesky Krumlov. Vegetarian and vegan items are clearly designated on the menu.
